resources.string: ToothCoach is a toothbrush accessory that improves oral hygiene using sensor feedback. Cues are delivered by the device actuators, and telemetry collected via the sensors.
Turn on the device, and attach it to your toothbrush. Press the button to begin the brief training step
1. Brush the lower-left teeth, change to lower-right on the beep
2. Brush your lower-right teeth, change to upper-left on the beep
3. Brush your upper-left teeth, change to upper-right on the beep
4. Brush your upper-right teeth. After the final beep, start your normal brushing!
Brush each quadrant of your mouth for approximately 30s. A beep will indicate when 30s has elapsed!
If open and connected, the phone will show real-time information. The statistics are sent at the end.
